data.title: POEM A DAY: BLACK BEANS
data.meta_description: A song for the restless this afternoon by the German poet Sarah Kirsch #keepcalmandreadpoems #stayathome #timeforacoffeebreak. Don’t forget to check out our isolation promotion for an extra poetry parcel when you join as a PBS Choice member today.
data.text:
A song for the restless this afternoon by the German poet Sarah Kirsch #keepcalmandreadpoems#stayathome#timeforacoffeebreak. Don’t forget to check out our isolation promotion for an extra poetry parcel when you join as a PBS Choice member today.
